rows.label: qev097804_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0002
rows.name: Stars are talking tonight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0003
rows.name: Hmm? Friend has business with Bobora?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0004
rows.name:
It must be important if friend is interrupting conversation
with stars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev097804_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bobora if he has a girlfriend who is ill.

rows.label: qev097804_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev097804_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Bobora why he is wandering.

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0005
rows.name: ...Hmm? Hrmrmrmmm?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0006
rows.name:
Friend knows about sweet Henahena waiting back at
caravan?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0007
rows.name: Who...who is friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0008
rows.name: That is not any business of friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0009
rows.name: But Bobora wanders for love of poor sick Henahena.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0010
rows.name:
Bobora is hoping against hope to find miracle cure
along the road.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0011
rows.name: ...What?! Friend has been to caravan of Bobora?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0012
rows.name: AND friend knows about Henahena?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0013
rows.name: Who...who is friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0014
rows.name: So friend came all this way as request from caravan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0015
rows.name:
Bobora thanks friend for making long trip.
So, what did caravan need?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0016
rows.name: Actually, forget that. How is Henahena?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0017
rows.name: ...What? WhaaaAAAaaat?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0018
rows.name: Henahena is...cured?! Someone found cure?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0019
rows.name:
All this wandering, and Bobora never find so much
as single clue![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0020
rows.name: But friend just turns up and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0021
rows.name: N-no! None of that matters![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0022
rows.name:
All that matters is getting home to see Henahena better
and smiling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097804_MSG0023
rows.name: Bobora heading back to caravan now![ST:wait ]
